subject: Re: Another "boring" weekend.
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
All i have is a small FM linear Box with a tiny perf board.  Seems 
to work well for me.  Maybe cheap and simple is the answer.  The 
answers and sentences they form come with time using the box and not 
how fantastic the sweep is.  They can use anything, but i'm trying 
random tuning next to compare to my linear.  There is a picture of 
my box in the Photos section here.  Nothing fancy, as a matter of 
fact, it's pretty flimsy but works and that's important.  Cost was 
under $100 with radio shack parts, you just need someone to build it 
that knows what they are doing.

-Steve
